keyMoments.title: Alliance Dynamic Shown
keyMoments.description: The episode demonstrates the caring relationship between Cricket, Masira, and Shoujou, with the two monkey pirates dedicated to helping Cricket achieve his dream.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the bonds within the Saruyama Alliance and establishes them as reliable allies.

keyMoments.title: Alliance with Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: The Saruyama Alliance, led by Cricket, agrees to help the Straw Hat Pirates reach Sky Island.
keyMoments.significance: Solidifies the cooperation between the two groups that will be crucial for the Sky Island journey.

goals.goal: Find evidence of the city of gold that Noland discovered
Prove Mont Blanc Noland was not a liar
Help the Straw Hats reach Sky Island

alliances.description: The Saruyama Alliance agrees to help the Straw Hats reach Sky Island via the Knock Up Stream.

description: An alliance formed by Mont Blanc Cricket with Masira and Shoujou to search for evidence of the legendary city of gold that Cricket's ancestor Noland discovered. The alliance combines Masira's salvage expertise and Shoujou's sonar capabilities with Cricket's determination.

trivia.fact: The name 'Saruyama' means 'Monkey Mountain,' referencing both Masira (monkey) and Shoujou (orangutan) who are part of the alliance.
All three leaders of the alliance are united by their belief in the legend of Noland and their dedication to finding the truth.
